item.title: "Monk: Way of the Cobalt Soul" - title change
item.description:
Page: Monk: Way of the Cobalt Soul (monk:cobalt-soul)
Current revision number: 8
Date changed: Tue, 24 May 2022 21:38:36 +0000
Change type: title change
Change comments: Removed '(HB)' tag in title.
By: Zkaij

Page content preview:

item.title: "Owlin" - source change
item.description:
Page: Owlin (owlin)
Current revision number: 2
Date changed: Fri, 13 May 2022 21:52:20 +0000
Change type: source change
By: Deadly Bread

Page content preview:
Distant kin of giant owls from the Feywild, owlin come in many shapes and sizes, from petite and fluffy to wide-winged and majestic. Owlin have arms and legs like other Humanoids, as well as wings...

Source: Unearthed Arcana 77 - Folk of the Feywild Distant kin of giant owls, owlfolk come in many shapes and sizes, from petite and fluffy to widewinged and majestic. Owlfolk have arms and legs...
